recipesJson.name: Flaming Donuts (DMC Cinnamon Challenge).
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description: A delicious cream filled fried donut dusted with cinnamon and sugar. YummyðŸ”¥ I really enjoy this!! Hope you guys do as well.

reviews.text: At first I was on the fence with this one. I steeped for a week. Smells great & on  knuckle test it taste great but when I first started vaping it the only flavor I was getting was the cinnamon spice. Then as the day went on i started to notice the donut and the creams. Once I run out going to mix again and sub in rich cinnamon for the cinnamon spice and leave out the sweetner
